item.title: VOLVO FH 2024 v4.4 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 17, 2025

VOLVO FH 2024 v4.4 1.54 ETS2

The Volvo FH 2024 v4.4 (1.54) in Euro Truck Simulator 2 is a cutting-edge truck mod replicating Volvo’s latest FH series, featuring sleek redesigned styling, advanced digital dashboards, and efficient D13TC/D16K engines (up to 780 hp). The v4.4 update adds 4K textures, customizable LED lighting, animated components (e.g., sun visors, mirrors), and compatibility with 1.54. Ideal for modern freight transport, it blends aerodynamics with premium driver comfort.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR CLASSE A

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Volvo FH5 3 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 17, 2025

Volvo FH5 3 1.54 ETS2

The Volvo FH5 3 (1.54) in Euro Truck Simulator 2 is a high-performance truck mod inspired by Volvo’s FH series, featuring a custom 5-axle chassis for heavy cargo transport. It includes upgraded engines (e.g., D16K, up to 750 hp), reinforced suspension, and customizable bodywork (e.g., bumper guards, light bars). The 1.54 update ensures compatibility, while mods may add exclusive paint jobs or animated accessories. Ideal for oversized loads or niche roleplay, it combines power with versatility.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR CLASSE A

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: IVECO S WAY v3.8 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 17, 2025

IVECO S WAY v3.8 1.54 ETS2

The Iveco S-Way v3.8 (1.54) in Euro Truck Simulator 2 is a modern long-haul truck mod, replicating Iveco’s flagship S-Way series with sleek aerodynamics and advanced Cursor 9/11/13 engines (up to 570 hp). The v3.8 update adds 4K textures, customizable digital dashboards, LED lighting packs, and animated features (e.g., sun visors, wipers). Optimized for 1.54, it includes realistic fuel efficiency and multiple cabin variants (Normal/High-Entry). Ideal for eco-conscious virtual truckers, it blends Italian styling with cutting-edge tech.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR CLASSE A

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Carga Seca Graneleiro Manos 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 17, 2025

Carga Seca Graneleiro Manos 1.54 ETS2

The Carga Seca Graneleiro Manos 1.54 in Euro Truck Simulator 2 is a Brazilian-style grain trailer mod, designed for bulk cargo transport (e.g., soybeans, corn). Featuring authentic “graneleiro” hydraulics for tilting, customizable liveries (farm/company logos), and realistic cargo physics, it pairs with trucks like Volvo FH or Scania R-series. The 1.54 update ensures stability, while mods may add dirt/dust effects or animated unloading. Ideal for agricultural roleplay, it enhances farming logistics.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR CLASSE A

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Tecnobus Tribus 4 1.5x ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 17, 2025

Tecnobus Tribus 4 1.5x ETS2

The Tecnobus Tribus 4 (1.5x) in Euro Truck Simulator 2 is a modern articulated city bus mod, designed for high-capacity urban transport. Featuring a low-floor design, eco-friendly hybrid/electric propulsion, and accessible entryways, it prioritizes public transit efficiency. The bus includes realistic interior details, dynamic route displays, and customizable liveries for municipal or private operators. The 1.5x update ensures compatibility with multiple game versions, while mods may add animated accordion joints, passenger flow systems, or specific city branding. Ideal for busy metro routes or eco-conscious roleplay, it delivers a polished, large-scale transit experience.

Credits: NORMA GAME

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
